subject: Running
New York City Marathon
lead_paragraph: Steve Pusztay was one of 55 runners to complete the first New York City Marathon, but his journey was much longer than four hours’ drive and 26.2 miles on foot.
snippet: Steve Pusztay was one of 55 runners to complete the first New York City Marathon, but his journey was much longer than four hours’ drive and 26.2 miles on foot.
